org.rapla.mobile.android.activity

Class LoginActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • org.rapla.mobile.android.activity.BaseActivity
        • org.rapla.mobile.android.activity.LoginActivity

  • public class LoginActivity
extends BaseActivity
    The login screen is only shown at the first time when the application will be started. The user has to type in his data. Optionally this screen can be call from the HomeActivity when the user wants to change the settings.
    Author:
    Patrick Zorn
